data.name: ForgotPassword
data.value: Forgot Password

data.name: Success.Account.Verified
data.value: User Account Verified Successfully. You Can Now Login With Your Username And Password Below.

data.name: Message.Account.NotVerified
data.value: User Account Could Not Be Verified. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: Success.Account.Linked
data.value: User Account Linked Successfully. You Can Now Login With Your External Login Below.

data.name: Message.Account.NotLinked
data.value: External Login Could Not Be Linked. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: Error.Login.Fail
data.value: Login Failed. Please Remember That Passwords Are Case Sensitive. If You Have Attempted To Sign In Multiple Times Unsuccessfully, Your Account Will Be Locked Out For A Period Of Time. Note That User Accounts Require Verification When They Are Initially Created So You May Wish To Check Your Email If You Are A New User.

data.name: Message.Required.UserInfo
data.value: Please Provide All Required Fields

data.name: Info.SignedIn
data.value: You Are Already Signed In

data.name: Message.ForgotPassword
data.value: Please Enter The Username Related To Your Account And Then Select The Forgot Password Option Again

data.name: Message.ForgotUser
data.value: Please Check The Email Address Associated To Your User Account For A Password Reset Notification

data.name: Message.UserDoesNotExist
data.value: User Does Not Exist

data.name: Code.HelpText
data.value: Please Enter The Secure Verification Code Which Was Sent To You By Email.

data.name: Code.Placeholder
data.value: Verification Code

data.name: Code.Text
data.value: Verification Code:

data.name: Error.TwoFactor.Fail
data.value: Verification Failed. Please Ensure You Entered The Code Exactly In The Form Provided In Your Email. If You Wish To Request A New Verification Code Please Select The Cancel Option And Sign In Again.

data.name: Message.TwoFactor
data.value: A Secure Verification Code Has Been Sent To Your Email Address. Please Enter The Code That You Received. If You Do Not Receive The Code Or You Have Lost Access To Your Email, Please Contact Your Administrator.

data.name: Password.HelpText
data.value: Please Enter The Password Related To Your Account. Remember That Passwords Are Case Sensitive. If You Attempt Unsuccessfully To Log In To Your Account Multiple Times, You Will Be Locked Out For A Period Of Time.

data.name: Password.Placeholder
data.value: Password

data.name: Password.Text
data.value: Password:

data.name: Remember.HelpText
data.value: Specify If You Would Like To Be Signed Back In Automatically The Next Time You Visit This Site

data.name: Remember.Text
data.value: Remember Me?

data.name: Username.HelpText
data.value: Please Enter The Username Related To Your Account

data.name: Username.Placeholder
data.value: Username

data.name: Username.Text
data.value: Username:

data.name: Use
data.value: Use

data.name: Error.LoadLogin
data.value: Error Loading Login

data.name: Error.Login
data.value: Error Performing Login

data.name: Error.ResetPassword
data.value: Error Resetting Password

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.DuplicateEmail
data.value: Multiple User Accounts Already Exist With The Email Address Of Your External Login. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.InvalidEmail
data.value: The External Login Provider Did Not Provide A Valid Email Address For Your Account. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.ProviderKeyMismatch
data.value: An Error Occurred Verifying Your External Login. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.UserDoesNotExist
data.value: A User Account Matching The Email Address Of Your External Login Does Not Exist. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.UserNotCreated
data.value: A User Account Could Not Be Created For Your External Login. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.VerificationRequired
data.value: In Order To Link Your External Login With Your User Account You Must Verify Your Identity. Please Check Your Email For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.AccessDenied
data.value: Your External Login Was Denied Access. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.RemoteFailure
data.value: Your External Login Failed. Please Contact Your Administrator For Further Instructions.
